# modificationDate

**Instance Property**

The date when you saved the game data or modified it.

## Declaration

```swift
var modificationDate: Date? { get }
```

## Discussion

Game Center sets this property when you save game data using the [doc://com.apple.gamekit/documentation/GameKit/GKLocalPlayer/saveGameData(_:withName:completionHandler:)] method. If you save game data using an existing filename, Game Center overwrites the file with the new data and changes the modification date.

## Retrieving Information About a Saved Game File

- **name**: The name of the saved game.
- **deviceName**: The name of the device that the player uses to save the game.
